```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

## Explanation

This file is used with the sole purpose of downloading the airbnb listings data from inside airbnb (http://insideairbnb.com/index.html) and saving it on the local repository in the data folder for further changes.

Code Chunk 1: Downloads the data of Airbnb in Amsterdam.
```{r data-download}
airbnb_listings <- read.csv("http://data.insideairbnb.com/the-netherlands/north-holland/amsterdam/2021-12-05/visualisations/listings.csv")
```

Code Chunk 2: Saves data as csv file in the repository's data folder. 
```{r data-save}
write.csv(airbnb_listings, "../data/airbnb_listings.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```
